title: Seibo Kannon daibosatsu (KÃ´ji Wakamatsu, 1977) 1080p
description:
Sacred Mother Kannon tells the story of a nun who believes herself to be the reincarnation of the legendary Happyaku Bikuni (also known as Yao Bikuni). Happyaku Bikuni supposedly became immortal as the result of eating mermaid's flesh, and lived for eight hundred years before finally disappearing into a cave in Wakasa. Now the nun only seeks death from her various lovers, though she can never seem to achieve it.

Sacred Mother Kannon has numerous ties to In the Realm of the Senses. Wakamatsu was the line producer and was responsible for hiring many cast/crew members. Eiko Matsuda returns as the lead in one her infrequent appearances, as do cinematographer Hideo Ito and composer Minoru Miki.

Screenplay by frequent Oshima collaborator Mamoru Sasaki. A young Renji Ishibashi also makes an appearance.

Subtitles by nitroblast for ADC
Transcription assistance by quaisnord
